sentences.en: " Was I right?'she said. " I saw you taking a crafty swig! "
sentences.cn: “ 我说得对 吗 ? ” 她说, “ 我看见你耍滑头悄悄地喝了一大口! ”

sentences.en: Brian took a swig of his beer.
sentences.cn: 布赖恩喝了一大口啤酒。

sentences.en: But while thirst is a good indicator that you are suffering from dehydration, your body can give you earlier warning signs that it's time to take a swig.
sentences.cn: 但是尽管口渴是脱水了的暗示，身体会更早发出警告信号，该是痛饮的时候了。

sentences.en: Don't swig beer the way you drink water.
sentences.cn: 别像水似的把啤酒一口喝干.

sentences.en: He pulled out a bottle of wine and took a swig.
sentences.cn: 老沙头从怀里拿出一瓶老白干,“咕嘟”,地调了一大口.

sentences.en: He sat swigging beer and smoking.
sentences.cn: 他坐着，一边大口喝啤酒一边抽烟。
他微笑接受,并一口喝尽.

sentences.en: He smiled and took a swig from the bottle.
sentences.cn: 他微微一笑,就着瓶子喝了一大口.

sentences.en: He smiled and took a swig.
He took a deep swig from the bottle.
sentences.cn: 他从瓶子里喝了一大口.

sentences.en: He took a swig at the aspirin and the sour grains stuck in his throat.
sentences.cn: 他用一大口水喝阿斯匹林,但酸涩的药片儿却卡在他的嗓子里.

sentences.en: He took a swig of water.
He took a swig of whisky from his hip flask.
sentences.cn: 他猛灌了一口扁酒瓶中的威士忌.

sentences.en: McGuire took a long swig from his bottle of bitter lemon.
sentences.cn: 麦圭尔举起瓶子咕咚咕咚地喝了一大通苦柠檬汁。

sentences.en: Now, she can lift a water bottle to her mouth for a swig, or feed herself.
sentences.cn: 现在她可以拿起水瓶畅饮, 或是自己进食.

sentences.en: She had a quick swig of water and then set off again.
sentences.cn: 她匆忙喝了一大口水,然后又出发了.

trans.tran_cn: 痛饮, 大喝(尤指从瓶口喝的)

trans.tran_en: to drink something in large mouthfuls, especially from a bottle
